content: 18 k13 ssk k4 k2tog k13 round 18 k14 ssk ssk k4 k2tog k2tog k14 round 19 knit round 19 knit stitch count 28 32 36 stitches all sizes work the cuff as follows with smaller needles * k2 p2 repeat * to end of round continue to work 2 x 2 ribbing for 2 2½ 3 inches then bobble loosely make a second identical bootie finishing sew up bottom seam using the long tail from the cast on weave in ends page 2 of 2
